title: foxglove.LocationFix
description: A navigation satellite fix for any Global Navigation Satellite System

frame_id.description: Frame for the sensor. Latitude and longitude readings are at the origin of the frame.

position_covariance.description: Position covariance (m^2) defined relative to a tangential plane through the reported position. The components are East, North, and Up (ENU), in row-major order.

position_covariance_type.title: foxglove.PositionCovarianceType
position_covariance_type.description: If `position_covariance` is available, `position_covariance_type` must be set to indicate the type of covariance.
